name: iPool
tagline: The central component for search and distribution of content within Axel Springer.
body:
## API Documentation

[Axel Springer Ideas Engineering](http://www.asideas.de) is developing a general platform for distributing and providing content as a company-wide service.

The key component of this platform is the **iPool information hub** that offers functionality for

* storing
* semantic enrichment
* evaluation
* retrieval
* fully automated filtering

of various [Axel Springer content](http://www.axelspringer.de/media/Unsere-Angebote-Bezahlangebote-National_21139178.html).

The main purpose of this page is to describe the structure and application of the **iPool frontend API** embodying the user access tool for all content items stored and indexed within the iPool.

Documentation PDF V3: http://bit.ly/iPool_API_V3_Documentation

Swagger UI V3: https://ipool.s.asideas.de/swagger-ui

Frontend API V3 clients:

 * Java: https://github.com/ipool/iPoolAPIClient-java
 * ObjC/XCode: https://github.com/ipool/iPoolAPIClient-ObjC-XCode
 * Python: https://github.com/ipool/iPoolAPIClient-python
 * Ruby: https://github.com/ipool/iPoolAPIClient-ruby
 * JavaScript: https://github.com/ipool/iPoolAPIClient-JavaScript
 * angularJS: https://github.com/ipool/iPoolAPIClient-angularJS   
 
_This is a work in progress page._

## API Registration

Applications to the iPool API are approved individually for each new project. For the [Berlin Music Hack Day](http://musichackday.de/) following time limited OAuth access credentials are provided:

    Key: musichackday2014
    Secret: 276ea410-29fb-11e4-8c21-0800200c9a66

Above credentials will expire on **2014-10-31**. Long lived credentials are provided on request.

## API Examples

1) Retrieve content provided by music magazines:

```javascript
    https://ipool.s.asideas.de:443/api/v3/search?limit=25&publisher="www.metal-hammer.de","www.musikexpress.de","www.rollingstone.de
```

2) Find some content about your favourite singer Udo Lindenberg:

```javascript
https://ipool.s.asideas.de:443/api/v3/search?limit=25&q="udo lindenberg"
```

3) Find some pictures related to Udo Lindenberg:

```javascript
https://ipool.s.asideas.de:443/api/v3/search?limit=25&sources="escenic"&q=udo lindenberg

"contentReferences": [
{
  "binaryIdentifier": "ba510dc99b37854928cf553c96144caa",
  ...
}
```

4) Find articles about Udo Lindenbergs musical called "Hinterm Horizont":

```javascript
https://ipool.s.asideas.de:443/api/v3/search?persons="udo lindenberg"&limit=25&q="Hinterm Horizont"
```

Get a related article to Udo Lindenbergs musical:

```javascript
"relatedReferences": [
{
  "identifier": "cece43dc263ae3bca9385c8ddccb6890",
  "type": "ARTICLE"
},
...
]

	    
https://ipool.s.asideas.de:443/api/v3/related/cece43dc263ae3bca9385c8ddccb6890
```
